description: beige cover with map, mythological creature, and title with ornate border; black spine; contains thick paperboard pages with photographic imagery, collages, and interactive pages of pop-ups and pop-outs; lender's archive # 47
medium: Color illustrations, diecut images, gold string, thread
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
title: Atlas des idéations
